original: 「若有善男子、善女人等，於此經中聞是諸佛如來名號，一心諦聽，或自憶念，或書寫讀誦、為他解說，彼人命終不墮惡趣，不生邊地、邪見、諸惡律儀、下賤族中，亦不生於長壽天中，亦不生於五濁惡世、飢饉、疾病、刀兵劫中，亦無王難、水難、火難、賊盜、虎狼等難；
analyzed: 「若有善男子、善女人等，於此經中聞是諸佛如來名號，一心諦聽，或自憶念，或書寫讀誦、為他解說，彼人命終不墮惡趣，不生邊地、邪見、諸惡律儀、下賤族中，亦不生於長壽天中，亦不生於五濁惡世、飢饉、疾病、刀兵劫中，亦無王難、水難、火難、賊盜、虎狼等難；
translated: If there are good sons, good women, and others who hear the names of these buddhas and tathagatas in this sutra, listen to them single-mindedly and truthfully, either recollecting them themselves, or copying, reciting, and explaining them to others, when their lives end they will not fall into evil destinies, will not be born in borderlands, with wrong views, in evil precepts, or in low-caste families, will not be born among long-lived gods, will not be born in the five turbidities, evil worlds, in famines, diseases, or wars, and will not have the difficulties of kings, water, fire, thieves, tigers, wolves, and so forth;

original: 常生佛剎及天上人間，身相端嚴，諸根具足，眷屬圓滿，得宿命智，具六波羅蜜，行四無量法，通達一切甚深法藏，成最上道。
analyzed: 常生佛剎及天上人間，身相端嚴，諸根具足，眷屬圓滿，得宿命智，具六波羅蜜，行四無量法，通達一切甚深法藏，成最上道。
translated: They will always be born in buddha-lands, in the heavens, and among humans. Their physical appearance will be upright and dignified, their faculties complete, their retinue perfect, they will attain the knowledge of past lives, possess the six perfections, practice the four immeasurables, penetrate all the profound Dharma treasures, and accomplish the supreme path.
